title: Stripe: Understanding Your Failed Payment Metrics
summary: This article explains how to interpret Stripe's failed payment reports and metrics, highlighting that Stripe's dashboard doesn't easily identify declined transactions. It introduces FlexPay's data science team as a solution to analyze these metrics, providing insights into decline rates, recovery rates, and forecasted uplift.
key_points: Stripe's dashboard makes it difficult to identify failed payments.
FlexPay's data science team can analyze Stripe payment data.
Key insights provided include Decline Rate, Recovery Rate of Declines, and Forecasted Uplift.
To get an accurate assessment, it's recommended to export at least six months of transaction data, excluding the current month.
